iree_add_all_subdirs()

iree_c_embed_data(
  NAME
    static_library_module
  SRCS
    "static_library_module.vmfb"
  C_FILE_OUTPUT
    "static_module.c"
  H_FILE_OUTPUT
    "static_module.h"
  IDENTIFIER
    "iree_samples_static_library_module"
  FLATTEN
  PUBLIC
)

if(NOT ${IREE_TARGET_BACKEND_DYLIB-LLVM-AOT} OR NOT ${IREE_TARGET_BACKEND_VULKAN-SPIRV}
   OR NOT ${IREE_HAL_DRIVER_DYLIB} OR NOT ${IREE_HAL_DRIVER_VULKAN})
  return()
endif()

iree_cc_binary(
  NAME
    static_library_demo
  SRCS
    "static_library_demo.c"
  DEPS
    ::static_library_module
    iree::base
    iree::hal
    iree::hal::local
    iree::hal::local::loaders::static_library_loader
    iree::hal::local::task_driver
    iree::modules::hal
    iree::task::api
    iree::vm
    iree::vm::bytecode_module
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/static_library_module.o
  DEFINES
    "IREE_STATIC_LIBRARY=1"
)

# Bytecode is built without cross-compilation. Bypass the following test if it
# is not built for the host machine.
